entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow after midnight. Local rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
